blogPost.excerpt: Coolr let's you launch the most fun virtual water cooler room directly in Slack in order to build stronger connections with your colleagues.

blogPost.title: Coolr - A virtual water cooler that lives in Slack
blogPost.author: Yanis Mellata

previous.excerpt: Cookies by Digger allows you to generate necessary infrastructure templates for your code projects. It's like create-react-app but for terraform.
